section.title: Print Statement by Customer Group
section.para: Customer Statements show past due information for open Receivables. To print a Customer Statement by Customer Group, select the "Print Statement by Customer Group" option.
When printing a Customer Statement by Customer Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Customer Group you want to print a consolidated statement for.
Specify the point-in-time date you want the statement to be relative to.
